nodes.text: The berserker fleet was a group of starships which fought in Hutt space several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. When the New Republic Intelligence agent Caern Adan explained the issue of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing operating at the planet Pandem Nai to General Hera Syndulla, the general agreed that the fighter wing was an issue, but cited the Imperial Moff Valco Pandion and the berserker fleet's presence in Hutt space as other problems for the New Republic that need to be addressed.
The berserker fleet was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
